participant_1.name: Evelyn
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and somewhat introverted, she often reflects on her life choices and appearance.
participant_1.background: I don’t know if I enjoy programming, or if it’s my only choice. I wear cardigans because I hope it makes me look more cultured. I hate that I got my brain from the dad I never met. My last name is Spanish, but I tell people that it’s Italian. I had one stepdad, and fortunately, he ignored me.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Creative and laid-back, he enjoys expressing himself through art and music.
participant_2.background: I work in a corner grocery store during the day. I like Dr Pepper and Blackjack gum, but not together. In the evenings I watch the door at a club where they play punk rock. My favorite show is Scooby-Doo. I draw comic books.

content.text: Hi, what do you do for a living?
I work at a corner grocery store during the day, and at a club in the evenings.
Oh, cool! Do you like it there?
Yeah, it's a lot of fun.
What do you do at the club?
I watch the door and make sure people don't get in trouble.
That sounds like a fun job.
It is, but it can be a lot of work.
Yeah, I like to draw comic books.
Oh, that's cool! What kind of comics do you draw?
I like to draw horror comics.
That sounds interesting. I've never read a horror comic before.
You should check them out, they're really fun.
I will. I like horror movies, so I'm sure I'll like horror comics too.
